title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2103.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2103.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to establish, as required by

Federal law, a Lender of Last Resort (LLR) program meeting Federal requirements
and making Federal Stafford Loans (both subsidized and unsubsidized) available
to eligible students who would otherwise be unable to obtain such
loans. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2103.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
